decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 2 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( Supporting Info and appendices, Appendix 9, Unnumbered Site Location Plan, 2197-01, Unnumbered Existing Block Plan Received: 29 February 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - This consent does not permit the demolition or dismantling of any part of the building, or the removal of any internal/external feature, floor, wall or ceiling surface, except in so far as the alterations hereby approved necessitate the removal of certain parts of the existing structure as specifically shown on the approved drawings.
description: Installation of internal partition walls to allow change of use from B1 to D1
